roleset.name: imagine
roleset.note: ENVISION-V NOTES: Frames file for 'envision' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no comparison. (from envision.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: pretty basic
example.text: In fact, DLJ says, the company envisions capital expenses of about $180 million a year.
example.arg: capital expenses of about $180 million a year
